import React from 'react'; import { useForm } from '../../hooks/useForm'; export const ContactSection = () => { const initialValues = { name: 'Rodrigo', email: 'rodriguezrodrigo127@gmail.com', phone: '3764254254', subject: 'Probando', message: 'estoy probando trolazo no te enojes' } const [ formValues, handleInputChange ] = useForm( initialValues ); const { name, email, phone, subject, message } = formValues; return (
